Transparency & Commitment

Our Prices and Consultation Terms

At Diaeta, we believe in clear pricing for excellent support. Discover below the details of our personalized services, designed to help you sustainably achieve your health goals, without hunger or frustration.

Book an Appointment

General Dietary Consultations

For sustainable weight loss, management of type 2 diabetes, improvement of lipid profile (cholesterol), and any other personalized nutritional need.

First Consultation

€80.00 (Approx. 60 min)

  • Complete health assessment, analysis of history and lifestyle habits.
  • Analysis of your body composition (if relevant) and your specific needs.
  • In-depth discussion of your goals and concerns.
  • Establishment of an initial personalized strategy and clear explanations of the Diaeta approach.

First Follow-up

€80.00 (Approx. 40 min, generally after 2 weeks)

  • Detailed analysis of your food diary (via our mobile tracking app).
  • Evaluation of your progress, discussion of challenges encountered.
  • First concrete adjustments to your nutritional strategy.
  • Answers to all your questions and practical advice.

Regular Follow-ups

€50.00 (Approx. 30 min, frequency to be defined together)

  • Monitoring of your progress (weight, body composition, symptoms, general well-being).
  • Continuous adaptation of your food plan for optimal results.
  • Reinforcement of your motivation and strategies to overcome obstacles.
  • Support and communication via the mobile app between sessions.

Specific Care: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)

Expert support based on the Low FODMAP approach from Monash University to restore your digestive comfort.

1. First Consultation (IBS)

€80.00 (Approx. 60 min)

  • Detailed evaluation of your digestive symptoms, medical history, and habits.
  • In-depth explanation of IBS and the Low FODMAP approach.
  • Instructions for keeping a precise food diary for 2 weeks.

2. Follow-up Assessment & Start of Elimination Phase

€80.00 (Approx. 40 min, after ~2 weeks of diary)

  • Analysis of your food diary and identification of potential FODMAPs.
  • Detailed explanation and implementation of the strict elimination phase (4 weeks).
  • Provision of Low FODMAP food lists, meal ideas, and alternatives.

3. Start & Planning of Reintroductions

€50.00 (Approx. 30 min, after the 4 weeks of elimination)

  • Review of the elimination phase and symptom improvement.
  • Explanation of the structured protocol for reintroducing the different FODMAP families.
  • Planning of the first reintroduction tests.

4. Post-Reintroduction Plan Consultation

€50.00 (Approx. 30 min, after the complete reintroduction phase)

  • Complete analysis of your reintroduction test results.
  • Development of your personalized, diversified, and sustainable diet.
  • Strategies for managing individual tolerances and maintaining digestive comfort.

The complete FODMAP journey extends over several months. During the reintroduction phase of the different FODMAP families (approximately 8-11 weeks), regular follow-ups (at the rate of €50/session) are often recommended for optimal support and to adjust the testing protocol.

Nutrigenetic Tests (Optional)

Deepen the personalization of your nutrition through the analysis of your DNA.

Nutrigenetic Test (via partner laboratory)

€275 (for the saliva collection kit and analysis of +70 genetic markers)

Reveal how your unique genetic profile influences your metabolism, your nutrient needs, and your response to different foods. This information allows for cutting-edge personalization of your nutritional plan for weight management, sports performance, fertility, or an optimized plant-based diet.

Discover the tests in detail

The consultation for the interpretation of your genetic results and their integration into your personalized nutritional plan is billed at the rate of a regular follow-up (€50).

✨ Special Duo Offer ✨

Start your health journey together! The first consultation for a couple is at the preferential rate of €130 (instead of €160 for two individual consultations).

Important Information

Health Insurance Reimbursements: Our dietary consultations may be partially reimbursed by most Belgian mutual health insurance funds. The conditions and amounts vary (generally between €10 and €25 per session, for a certain number of sessions per year). Do not hesitate to inquire directly with your insurance provider to know the details of your coverage. We will provide you with the necessary documents.

Payment Methods: Payments in the clinic are made in cash or by Bancontact via a QR code application on your smartphone.

Cancellation Policy: Your time is precious, and so is ours. If you are unable to make it, we thank you for notifying us at least 24 working hours in advance. Any consultation not cancelled within this period or without justification may be subject to a flat-rate administrative fee of €20. Thank you for your understanding.
